```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
tab <- read.table(here('data/giraffe/gsea_table.csv'), sep=',', header=T, row.names=1) %>%
  select(1:12) %>%
  filter(RNA.Expression.P.val < 0.1 &
    TSS.Coverage.P.val < 0.1 &
    Methylation.P.val < 0.1 &
    CpG.Coverage.P.val < 0.1)

# Remove double gene set for KRAS
tab <- tab[!rownames(tab) %in% 'HALLMARK_KRAS_SIGNALING_UP', ]
```
